ValidationRule.description: Validation rule to prevent the user from selecting "Not to be Evaluated" checkbox, if an Assessment is already completed.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( NOT ( ISNEW() ), ISCHANGED ( QA_Eval_Reason__c ), OR ( QA_Eval_Not_Evaluated__c , NOT ( ISBLANK ( TEXT ( QA_Eval_Reason__c ) ) ) ), NOT ( ISBLANK( QA_Eval_Related_Case_Assessment__c ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'QA_Eval_Related_Case_Call'
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quality Assessment is completed for this case/call. Please uncheck Not to be evaluated & clear reason field.
